retrieveUrls.main module¶

retrieveUrls.main.handler(event)[source]¶

Calls the appropriate function to retrieve the urls of the ads from the website given in the event

Parameters

event (dict) – Contains the website to scrape

Returns

The list of urls to scrape and to pass to the subsequent lambda function scrapeUrls

Return type

list

Raises

ValueError – Provides an error message if the website is not part of those for which the scrapers have been implemented
